caption.title: The predicted extent of (a) cutaneous and (b) visceral leishmaniasis under recent past conditions and under alternative climate change pathways and socio-economic storylines.
caption.p: The heavy blacklines across the middle of the box indicate median predicted extent across the 20 model runs; the box indicates the interquartile range of the data whilst the whiskers indicates the extremes. Note that the threshold that best predicted disease presence in cross-validation across model runs was used to assign pixels to presence or absence classes (values in Table 3).
